short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly switch to edit mode and access your funnels with our Super Editor extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Editor a simple chrome extension to save you time and frustrations when working with your CRM's page builder.  

Directly from your public page, with just 1-click, it will bring you directly to the page builder for your funnels, websites, forms or surveys.

The steps right now:
1. logging into your CRM
2. finding the correct page type (funnel or website)
3. locating the correct page within folders
4. locating the correct subpage or funnel step
5. clicking edit
6. starting work

With Super Editor, simply click the extension button and with just 1 click you are ready.  No more struggling to find the pages... and yes the struggle is real.

Note: a license key is required in order to activate the feature.
